metadata.title: Is It Possible to Log Measured Values?

sections.content:
Question:
Can I store measured values in a log? Can I output the log file?
Answer:
Yes.
See "Recording and Playing Monitoring Logs" in e2studio "HELP".
Suitable Products
RX113
RX130
RX231, RX230
